home.ctaText: Have a project in mind? Looking for a developer for your team? Let's talk!
home.trajectoryParagraph1:
I am in love with delivering technological solutions that combine performance, modern practices and good user experience. 
Throughout my career, I led projects for automation, creation and maintenance of websites in various technologies.
home.trajectoryParagraph2:
I have experience with front end, back end, mobile, 3D, automation, Devops culture, cloud (AWS, GCP and Azure), containerization with docker and CI/CD. 
I value good practices, clean code and collaboration with various teams. 
My goal is to build modern solutions that really add value, where, in an environment with active listening, we can gather the best ideas of all to deliver a perfect product to the customer.
